GSD.product_version: versions from v4.1 to before v5.12.9
GSD.description:
tipc: wait and exit until all work queues are done

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.12.9 by commit b9f5b7ad4ac3af006443f535b1ce7bff1d130d7d, it was introduced in version v4.1 by commit d0f91938bede204a343473792529e0db7d599836. For more details please see the references link.
